node.title: How The Digital Age Will Rescue Medicine
node.description:
Objectives:

1. Identify the Medical Practice Model Limitations 2. Discuss how a Digital Platform can massively enhance your effectiveness by magnifying your Professional Impact.

3. Illustrate using a Digital Platform to educate your patients and colleagues.

4. Demonstrate how patient Quality of Life is improved by using a Digital Platform.

5. Demonstrate how your income can be enhanced by using a Digital Platform.
